body:
Successfully builds on macOS 10.15.7 with Python 3.8.8 and Apple Clang 12.0.0.

Also managed to run a tutorial with the installation, so it definitely works, even on macOS (which ArcGIS doesn't support in general). Not sure if the Windows deps are actually needed, but they build without crashing, so why not include them.
title: py-arcgis: add new package
